info.name: Kinja - Make related video frame disappear
info.description: You know that frame with the autoplaying videos underneath the first sentence in every Kinja article? Yeah, fuck that. As a bonus, also fuck unrelated articles in the middle of text underneath the second paragraph. And videos on the main page, as well!
info.additionalInfo: Posting this since there had been enough interest by users of Kinja websites to get rid of it, and some people are too lazy and / or too arsed to learn anything CSS. Thanks to zigboom's Darker Kinja style for the domain name block. If there is anything missing from that, let me know. Update 11/22/17.1 Somehow through posting the code in multiple fields on Kinja the double-hyphen for the selector targeted became an em dash. Resolved. Update 12/08/17 Added AV Club, alphabetized domain list. Update 01/21/18 Happy new year! Added the in-the-middle articles regardless of how they're related because that can take a piss also. Comment if you'd rather want those back, thank you. Update 02/17/18 Alright Kinja, screw you. Recent videos in the front page? Yeah, no. Update 08/16/18.1 Videos that just load and autoplay in the browser. Alright Kinja fuck you too. Update 08/16/18.2 Oops I broke it again. Oh well, fixed.
